short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to view your characters, encounters and a spectator with a box with Youtube or other url to music.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DnD Beyond Maps Enhanced: Encounters, Characters, and Streaming

Description:
Tired of switching between multiple tabs during your D&D sessions? With the DnD Beyond Maps Enhanced extension, you can have everything you need in one place!

Features:
- Encounters for the DM: Easily add encounters from DnD Beyond to your virtual tabletop with one click. The extension pre-loads monster tokens and configures stats for easy combat.
- Character Sheet for Players: Quickly access your DnD Beyond character sheet directly on the map, allowing you to view your abilities, spells, and equipment during gameplay.
- Streaming with Meet: Create a seamless streaming experience with a customizable overlay that includes dice rolling, ambient music, and more.

Why use the DnD Beyond Maps Enhanced extension?
- Simplifies gameplay: Have everything you need for your D&D session in one place, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tabs and websites.
- Enhances immersion: Create a more immersive atmosphere for your players with pre-loaded monster tokens and ambient music.
Increases productivity: Optimize game time with quick access to character and encounter information.

Install now and prepare for your next adventures!

With the DnD Beyond Maps Enhanced extension, you can have a more organized, immersive, and productive D&D experience.

This extension is open source and released under a GPL v3 License with some parts under MIT license.
